trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Gir et <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"> </xref> implementering slik at du kan bruke mønsteret "svake hendelsen lytteren" knytte lyttere for den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelser.

trans-unit.source: In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.
trans-unit.target: For å være lyttere i dette mønsteret, må lytteren objektene implementere <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> on the class that is the source of the events.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å implementere <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>i klassen som er kilde hendelser.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding uses this <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> so that internal classes that update bindings can attach listeners for a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> event on an object that is the target of a binding.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]databinding bruker denne <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager>slik at intern klasser som oppdaterer bindinger kan koble lyttere for en <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName>hendelse på et objekt som er målet for en binding.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager>

trans-unit.source: This supports notification for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger> mode of data binding, without creating strong references to data binding targets.
trans-unit.target: Dette støtter varsling for den <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>modus for databinding, uten å opprette sterkt refererer til data binding mål.</xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte hendelsesbehandlingen som kalles når angitte kilden opphøyer den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to specify the event handler you want to use to subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> event..
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å angi hendelsesbehandlingen du vil bruke til å abonnere på <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you use this method, your listener object does not need to implement the <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> interface.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker denne metoden, lytteren objektet trenger ikke å implementere den <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden objekt som du hever den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Representanten behandler den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: handler is .
trans-unit.target: handleris .

trans-unit.source: Adds the provided listener to the list of listeners on the provided source.
trans-unit.target: Legger til den angitte lytteren i listen over lyttere på den angitte kilden.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: Objektet med hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The object to add as a listener.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal legges til som en lytter.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et nytt objekt for å inneholde lyttere til den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Et nytt objekt som inneholder lyttere til den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner angitt hendelsesbehandlingen fra den angitte kilden.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden objekt som du hever den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Representanten behandler den <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: handler is .
trans-unit.target: handleris .

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified listener from the list of listeners on the provided source.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner den angitte lytteren fra listen over lyttere på den angitte kilden.

trans-unit.source: The object to remove the listener from.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å fjerne lytteobjektet fra.

trans-unit.source: The listener to remove.
trans-unit.target: Lytteobjektet fjerne.

trans-unit.source: Begins listening for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> event on the given source, attaching an internal class handler to that source.
trans-unit.target: Starter lytter det <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelse på den angitte kilden, tilknytting en intern klassen håndterer til denne kilden.

trans-unit.source: The provided source is checked for type to see if it is <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> , and then adds the class handler for the appropriate event to that source.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte datakilden er merket av for type for å se om det er <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>eller <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>, og legger til et klassen behandlingsprogram for riktig hendelse i denne kilden.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The object on which to start listening for the pertinent <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal starte lytter for den relevante <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> event on the given source.
trans-unit.target: Stopper lytter det <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> hendelse på den angitte kilden.

trans-unit.source: The source object on which to stop listening for <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kildeobjektet som skal stoppes lytte <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref>.
